author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Schluter shower drain tips…sometimes the shower drain riser pipe is already installed. One solution is this internal pipe cutter. It’s from Wheeler-Rex and specifically for 2-inch pipes. I set the height of the cutter and use a drill. It cuts perfectly and a great solution for scenarios like this 👍🏽🔥#plumbing #bathroomremodel #homerepairtutor
title: Schluter Shower Drain Tips - #shorts #homerepairtutor
